name: JunkFoodRun！
description:
Hope you like it

Operating Instructions

Use keyboard A, D or mouse to slide the character left and right to eat three kinds of food on the treadmill and avoid feces

Hamburg: add 1 point

Coke: Add 3 minutes and increase movement speed by 3 seconds

French fries: add 5 minutes, and double the score of the added 5 seconds

Shit: minus 1 HP
